data.title: Who is who at CERN - Biographical information
data.meta_description: Here you will find information about some of the people who have worked at CERN; the articles are all taken from the CERN Courier. This page is gradually being replaced by Wikipedia CERN people.
data.text:
Here you will find information about some of the people who have worked at CERN; the articles are all taken from the CERN Courier. This page is gradually being replaced by Wikipedia CERN people.
